about_the_game:
Hauntings. Rituals. A strange internet. And you, an occult streamer, flirting with madness and mutilation as you find out just how far you'll go to please your audience and get internet famous in this psycho-horror RPG streaming management sim.



features...

RPG MANAGEMENT SIM GAMEPLAY. manage your skills, social stats, money, viewers, subscribers, relationships and more as you juggle your stream... and your survival.

UNIQUE PLAYTHROUGHS. encounter countless procedurally generated events, NPCs, webpages, items, entities, histories, stories, rituals, crafting recipes and more! no two playthroughs are ever the same.

EMERGENT NARRATIVES. completely randomised encounters, events, characters, histories and outcomes mean a story which makes itself in response to your actions -- and those of the world around you.

SURF THE WORLD'S FIRST GENERATED INTERNET. explore a procedurally generated infinite internet, filled with strange individuals, bizarre writings, insidious entities, peculiar marketplaces and a whole host of disturbing knickknacks and webpages to share with your subscribers.

CUTTING-EDGE NPC AI. each denizen of the dark web has their own unique generated vocabularies, speech styles, opinions, backstories, webpages, stats, and more, utilising AI technology based on anthropology+linguistic theory. all NPCs live their own lives alongside yours -- you ain't the only hero of this show. make friends and enemies, improve your relationships or fend off the people you accidentally enraged. it's all part of being on the internet, baby.

GET HAUNTED. while you’re raking in that sweet, sweet streamer cash, watch out for supernatural entities coming along with it. every creepy object you purchase and show off to your stream has a chance to unleash a haunted hell upon your cozy little apartment – no pressure, no pressure.

DO WEIRD RITUALS AND CRAFT WEIRD STUFF. find, purchase or pry occult recipes and rituals from the web to protect yourself from your increasingly contaminated apartment. procedurally generated recipes means no googling what you want - you work for that ish, every time.

FORGE YOUR OWN IDENTITY. the internet changes you. fame changes you. being scared as all hell changes you. everything you encounter in darkwebSTREAMER changes you meaningfully and is tracked in your skills, stats, moods, memories and more. every decision influences future decisions and opportunities. who will you be?



AND THERE'S MORE...
but that's for you to discover. what are you going to give up on the road to fame?

developers: We Have Always Lived In The Forest
name: darkwebSTREAMER

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard

publishers: We Have Always Lived In The Forest
reviews:
“I don’t know what’s going on. I don’t know what’s going to happen. But I’m hooked by this delectable, terrifying absurdity and don’t want to close the dark web and go to bed.”
- IGN

“*screaming and flailing*”
- multiple large men at the demo booth

“"A horror simulation game that merges the perils of modern streaming with the '90s internet."”
- The New York Times
short_description: Become an occult streamer on a 90s dark internet in this horror RPG sim. Experience a fully procedurally generated world and endless sinister stories as you grow your stream, surf the web, perform rituals, make hard choices, manage your stats and try to survive your increasingly haunted apartment.
